div.head: 取吐利
div.div: to stimulate vomiting and free flow

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: to stimulate vomiting and free flow

sense.def: Therapeutic Approach identical with qu tu xia 取吐下 , to stimulate vomiting and discharge. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 12: Recipe Entry qi po wan bing wan 耆婆萬病丸 , “granny’s pills for a myriad of diseases”: 卒病欲死，服三丸如小豆，取吐利即瘥 , “If in the case of a violent disease [a patient] comes close to dying, have him ingest three pills of the size of small beans to stimulate vomiting and free flow . This will bring the cure”. Qu tu xia 取吐下 , to stimulate vomiting and discharge [5]

Alternative Names qu tu li 取吐利. Therapeutic Approach using emetic and laxative pharmaceutical substances to stimulate vomiting and defecation for therapeutic purposes. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 9: 不可苟依日數，輒取吐下 , “One must not exclusively depend on the number of days [the disease has lasted] and always stimulate vomiting and discharge ”.
